name: Tinyus
overview: Tinyus is a faithful Amiga OCS port of the Arcade Gradius/Nemesis videogame It has been created by Fade1/aBYSs who is doing the graphics, Pink/ABYSs who is doing the music and code, Bartman/aBYSs who will be doing the reverse engineering, and all of this requiring an OCS with 512k Chip and 512k Slowmem or better! (Amiga 1200 (barebone) is recommended for fluid 50fps gameplay)
